node.title: Father Abraham: The Intercessor
node.description:
The most prolific author of the New Testament, the Apostle Paul, names Abraham as the “Father of all those who believe.” Undoubtedly this is referring to spiritual lineage, with his spiritual descendants reflecting his character and life choices.

 

A spiritual quality of Abraham – and later of Christ – is his interceding in behalf of others, even those who don’t seem to deserve intercession. Learn how Abraham lived – and left an example for those of us living in the last days.
